channel.title: Run Server need help
channel.description:
Every time i try to Run Server an error keeps occurring saying could not find the main class: server.server
please can some one walk me through this and help me fix it i the code i have in the Run Server is below [code]@echo off title Leonscape java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat pause[/code]
[size=12pt]SOME ONE HELP!![/size]

item.title: Run Server need help

item.description:
@leonscape wrote:

Every time i try to Run Server an error keeps occurring saying could not find the main class: server.server

please can some one walk me through this and help me fix it i
